Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic administrative text on recto (4 ll.), verso pasted down. Receipt for taxes paid by Teianti(?) daughter of Zeho in respect of land or houses purchased by her. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "year 21 Phamenoth 4 [of Ptol. Soter I?] = BC. 284. May 4(?)". Nos.10522-10532 and 10535-10537 belonging to the same archive, cf. P. BM EA 10522.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Thebes (historic - Upper Egypt) ((VS Thompson's MS, which gives Gebelein))
Bibliographic references: Glanville 1939 / Catalogue of Demotic Papyri in the British Museum I: A Theban Archive of the Reign of Ptolemy I, Soter (p.xlvi, 39-41, pl.12)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (43765) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/43765)
